channel.title: Deloitte on Old Habits AI Hard
channel.description: Recent content in Deloitte on Old Habits AI Hard

item.title: Deloitte 2018 ML Guild Hackathon
item.description: View this project on Github Background Every year the Deloitte Machine Learning Guild hosts an their annual hackathon, which is the largest Data Science / ML hackathon of its kind within Deloitte. Interested folks form teams of 2-4 people and work on the assigned hackathon theme for a duration of 2-4 weeks, after which the teams are judged based on a variety of criteria. The judges are Deloite ML Guild Masters who are subject matter experts in ML and DS, as well as partners who are interested in the field.

item.title: Projects @ Deloitte
item.description: This post is a collection of projects I have worked on at Deloitte. These aren’t related to Machine Learning per se. The ML projects at Deloitte are tagged as Deloitte in their respective posts. Oracle Security and Controls: Implemented Oracle EBS and Oracle Cloud Security and Controls on FSCM (Financial Supply Chain Management) and HCM (Human Capital Management) modules on multiple client engagements. Responsible for role builds, defect resolution, data security and access provisioning.
